text: Lɨci iamɨgali ahica agɨlaŋ nudɨ abavɨmi. Iamɨgali Ibɨlu ciaŋ hɨsɨŋ agɨlaŋ iamɨgali Isipɨ fɨli tɨbɨ hɨsɨŋ agɨlaŋ me hɨma uavɨmi. Nɨbɨlaŋ iamɨgali ninanadi huhɨla huhɨla saŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ daŋ sadaŋ ninanadi lɨhalɨha huhɨlavɨhehavɨlalɨ uavɨmi. Lɨhavɨdaci hulɨ lagulagu hɨsɨŋ alaŋ sɨvɨ sɨbaŋ uu iahulalu uavɨmi.
